content.p: Assistant Professor of Digital Marketing - Admissions, Recruitment & Marketing (ARM) Officer - UG Admissions Tutor - Deputy Director MBA, Faculty of Social Sciences Dr. Hamza is an alumnus of the University of Malaya, Malaysia, and also visited Universität der Bundeswehr, Germany for his doctoral research work. Since 2014, he has been actively engaged in teaching and conducting research at the university level. Prior to embarking on his academic career, he held positions with Reckitt and Zong (a subsidiary of China Mobile) and also provided marketing consultancy services to Family Food Products. Dr. Hamza's primary research areas of interest encompass digital marketing, tourism, and human-computer interaction through augmented and virtual reality. He has authored publications in esteemed journals, such as Computers in Human Behavior, International Journal of Consumer Studies, International Journal of Human-Computer Interaction, and others. Additionally, Dr. Hamza is a reviewer for numerous journals, including Journal of Business Research, Technological Forecasting & Social Change, Computers in Human Behavior, Psychology & Marketing, European Journal of Information Systems, and Sage Open. He has also worked as an assistant editor of the UW Journal of Management Sciences (UWJMS), delivered keynote speeches at international conferences, and served as a resource person for workshops. Dr Hamza is involved in teaching modules such as Digital Marketing, Managing and Marketing Tourism, Marketing Analytics, Marketing & Society, and Technology & Organization.
